actionCalls.description: Sends an email using the "PS Escalations BI Case Creation Alert" to the "PS Escalations BI Group" public group alerting them that a new Case has been created
actionCalls.name: EmailAlertToBIQueue
actionCalls.label: EmailAlertToBIQueue

actionCalls.description: Sends an email using the "PS Escalations GMS Case Creation Alert" to the "PS Escalations GMS Group" public group alerting them that a new Case has been created
actionCalls.name: EmailAlertToGMSQueue
actionCalls.label: EmailAlertToGMSQueue

actionCalls.description: Sends an email alert to the members of the PMS Queue to alert them there is a new PS Escalations case.
actionCalls.name: EmailAlertToPMSQueue
actionCalls.label: EmailAlertToPMSQueue

actionCalls.description: Sends an email using the "PS Escalations Case Creation Email Alert" to the "PS Escalations" public group alerting them that a new Case has been created
actionCalls.name: EmailAlertToPSEscalationsQueue
actionCalls.label: EmailAlertToPSEscalationsQueue

actionCalls.description: Sends an email to the Case creator with a link to their new Case
actionCalls.name: EmailAlertToRequester
actionCalls.label: EmailAlertToRequester

actionCalls.description: Sends an email using the "PS Escalations Web Case Creation Alert" to the "PS Escalations Web Group" public group alerting them that a new Case has been created
actionCalls.name: EmailAlertToWebQueue
actionCalls.label: EmailAlertToWebQueue

assignments.description: Assigns field values to the new Case record
assignments.name: AssignNewRecord
assignments.label: AssignNewRecord

assignments.description: Assigns the Working With Customer End Date value to a temporary variable to use in a formula so it displays in the description field correctly.
assignments.name: AssignTempDateVariable
assignments.label: AssignTempDateVariable

decisions.description: Decides which Product was chosen from the first screen to send the correct queue email
decisions.name: DecideProductForEmail
decisions.label: DecideProductForEmail

decisions.description: ecides which Product was chosen from the first screen to assign the correct queue as Case Owner
decisions.name: DecideProductForOwner
decisions.label: DecideProductForOwner

Flow.description: NICC-057654; updated via NICC-059265; updated via NICC-06144; NICC-063942 Screen Flow to create PS Escalations Cases

dynamicChoiceSets.description: Populated from the picklist field called "PS Case Priority" on the custom metadata type "Case Object Picklist Setup"
dynamicChoiceSets.name: PSCasePriorityPicklistChoiceSet

dynamicChoiceSets.description: Presents a list of Products for PS Escalation cases. Populated from the picklist field called "PS Case Product" on the custom metadata type "Case Object Picklist Setup"
dynamicChoiceSets.name: PSCaseProductPicklistChoiceSet

formulas.description: hyperlink to route users back to beginning of the Flow
formulas.name: formulaCreateNewCaseLink
formulaDescription
formulas.expression: {!DescriptionScreenInput} &" "& {!varLineBreak}& "Vendor: " &" "& {!VendorInput} &" "& {!varLineBreak}& "I am working with this customer until:" &" "& {!varTempEndDate} &" "& {!varLineBreak}& "Product & Version: " &" "& {!ProductVersionInput} &" "& {!varLineBreak}& "How is this issue impacting the customer?" &" "&{!IssueImpactingCustomerScreenInput}

formulas.description: hyperlink to the new Case that was just created
formulas.name: formulaNewCaseRecordLink

Flow.label: Case - PS Escalations Case Creation

recordCreates.name: CreateCase
recordCreates.label: CreateCase

recordLookups.label: GetGMSQueueRecord

recordLookups.label: GetOpportunity

recordLookups.description: Gets details about the Project that will be associated to the Case

fields.name: CreateCaseFaultScreenDisplayText
fields.fieldText:
Your Case cannot be created at this time. Please review the error message below for issues that need to be resolved or contact your system administrator for assistance.


{!$Flow.FaultMessage}


Click Previous to return to the wizard to correct your information.

fields.name: CaseCreationScreenDisplayText
fields.fieldText:
PS Escalations Case Creation Form

Please use this form to report questions, problems or enhancement requests for:

  • BI
  • GMS
  • Property Management Products
  • Sales and Catering
  • Service Optimization
  • Web

fields.name: PriorityScreenInput
fields.fieldText: Priority - For problem requests, please specify your request priority. This field defaults to P3 which is normal priority. Click the circle to see priority descriptions.
fields.helpText:
P1 - Critical. Business impacting. Will be reviewed and worked within 1 business day. Resolution may take longer.

P2 - High Importance. Impacting one or more areas of the application.

P3 - Normal Priority. Doesn't impact the flow of training, typically a workaround exists.

fields.name: SubjectScreenInput
fields.fieldText: Subject - Indicate a brief summary of your question, problem, or enhancement request.

fields.name: DescriptionScreenInput
fields.fieldText: Detailed Summary and Steps to Reproduce

fields.name: WorkingWithCustomerEndDate
fields.fieldText: I am working with this customer until:

fields.name: IssueImpactingCustomerScreenInput
fields.fieldText: How is this issue impacting the customer?
fields.helpText: <for example, customer not able to login or update records, etc.>

fields.name: EmailCommunicationsDisplayText
fields.fieldText: Please attach any email communications or other attachments as a file on the next screen.

screens.description: Shows the User the Case Number of the Case that was created
screens.name: NewCaseScreen
screens.label: NewCaseScreen

fields.name: CaseCreatedDisplayText
fields.fieldText:
Your Case has been created and you can now attach files to your case.


If you do not have any files, or you are done adding files, please click "Go to Case" to review your newly-created Case record or "Enter New Case" to return to the form.

fields.name: GoToCaseDisplayText
fields.fieldText:
Go to Case


﻿Enter New Case

textTemplates.description: Template to send an email alert to the user who created the Case, alerting them their Case has been created and including a link to the Case.
textTemplates.name: templateCaseEmailAlert
textTemplates.text:
*** NEW PS Escalations CASE ASSIGNMENT NOTIFICATION ***

The following case has been assigned to {!GetNewCaseRecord.Owner:Group.Name}. The Customer Delivery Managers will review the case and ensure it is quickly routed to the right resource to assist.

Case #: {!GetNewCaseRecord.CaseRecordURL__c}

Account Name: {!AccountInputScreen.recordName}

Subject: {!GetNewCaseRecord.Subject} 

Thank you.

variables.description: Holds the ID of the Account the Case will be connected to
variables.name: varAccountId

variables.description: Holds the Id of an Opportunity record
variables.name: varOpportunityId

variables.description: Holds the Id of a Project record
variables.name: varProjectId

variables.description: Holds the record of the Queue
variables.name: varQueueRecord
